column2: this should be at the top. It's the ultimate foodies' date. Just let the staff take care of you as the chef will often make dishes outside the menu and ask for your honest opinion
column3: so even if you are a regular
column4: you'll still get hit with occasional surprises! Been there three times now for birthdays and anniversaries and they usually kill it. Of course
column5: my favorite part is the nigiri.
